DocAttribute.Name: RelatedObjects
DocAttribute.Documentation: Objects or Types, to which the external references or information is associated.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _IfcRelAssociates_ relationship is restricted to associate information object, such as classification, document, library information, material, etc., to semantic object (occurrence objects based on _IfcObject_, and type objects, based on _IfcTypeObject_).
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* RelatedObjects | NOT(('IFCKERNEL.IFCOBJECTDEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(temp)) OR ('IFCKERNEL.IFCPROPERTYDEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(temp))) )) = 0
